text: Kim Beom-soo (born 8 March 1966) is a South Korean billionaire businessman, the chairman of Daum Kakao, a South Korean internet company. ==Early life== He has a BSc degree in engineering, and an MSc degree, both from Seoul National University. ==Career== In May 2015, Forbes estimated his net worth at US$2.4 billion. ==Personal life== He is married with two children and lives in Seoul, South Korea. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean billionaires Category:South Korean businesspeople Category:Seoul National University alumni Category:People from Seoul
title: Kim Beom-soo (businessman)
